name: Master Equation Technologies
tagline: Offshore Web & Mobile App Development Company
description:
We eat, sleep, and breathe apps. It's who we are. From idea storming to designing and developing awesome apps to lifecycle management, at Master Equation we provide full-service engagements as well as customized tech services. Our handcrafted apps are a perfect blend of Beauty & Purpose, that will surely make you go WOW!
We help Startups, SMEs and large Enterprises with their Technology needs to deliver highly polished Web, Cloud, and Mobile apps. Backed by outstanding teams of designers, engineers, developers, marketers, analysts, and strategists who are united by an unwavering passion for quality, Master Equation excels in delivering amazing mobile apps that matter the most in today's Mobile First era. 
From native iOS, Android, Windows apps to cross-platform apps to customized Enterprise mobile apps with a secure backend, we build it all; for any platform and any market segment. Wearables and the IoT are our new love. We have developed beautiful Ecommerce websites, custom cloud ERP Solutions, Rich Internet Applications that solve unique business problems. Our web apps and responsive websites are fast-loading, highly optimized with secured backend and delightful frontend.
READ MORE...
